00037 static unsigned short I;
00038 
00040 static unsigned char delay;
00041 
00043 static unsigned char sound;
00044 
00046 static unsigned char* registers;
00047 
00049 static unsigned short pc;
00050 
00052 static unsigned char sp;
00053 
00055 static unsigned short* stack;
00056 
00057 int setupCPU() {
00058 time_t seconds;
00059     addEntry(LOW_LEVEL_OPERATION, "CPU initialization ...");
00060 
00061     I = delay = sound = sp = 0;
00062     pc = DATA_SPACE_START;
00063 
00064     registers = (unsigned char*)calloc(MAX_REGISTERS, sizeof(unsigned char));
00065     if(registers == NULL) return 1;
00066 
00067     stack = (unsigned char*)calloc(MAX_STACK_SIZE, sizeof(unsigned char));
00068     if(stack == NULL) return 1;
00069 
00070     addEntry(LOW_LEVEL_OPERATION, "CPU initialized.");
00071 
00072 time(&seconds);
00073 srand((unsigned int) seconds);
00074 
00075     return 0;
00076 }
00077 
00078 void cleanupCPU() {
00079     addEntry(LOW_LEVEL_OPERATION, "CPU  cleanup.");
00080 
00081     free(registers);
00082     free(stack);
00083 }
00084 
00089 inline static void opCLS() {
00090     clearScreen();
00091 }
00092 
00099 inline static void opRET() {
00100     addEntry(DISASSEMBLY, "RET");
00101     pc = stack[--sp];
00102 }
00103 
00111 inline static void opJP(unsigned short addr) {
00112     pc = addr - 2;
00113 }
00114 
00122 inline static void opJP(unsigned short nnn) {
00123     pc = nnn + v[0] - 2;
00124 }
00125 
00133 inline static void opCALL(unsigned short addr) {
00134     stack[sp++] = pc;
00135     pc = addr - 2;
00136 }
00137 
00145 inline static void opSE(unsigned char X, unsigned char kk) {
00146     if(registers[X] == kk) pc += 2;
00147 }
00148 
00156 inline static void opSE2(unsigned char X, unsigned char Y) {
00157     if(registers[X] == registers[Y]) pc += 2;
00158 }
00159 
00167 inline static void opSNE(unsigned char X, unsigned char kk) {
00168     if(registers[X] =! kk) pc += 2;
00169 }
00177 inline static void opSNE2(unsigned char X, unsigned char Y) {
00178     if(registers[X] != registers[Y]) pc += 2;
00179 }
00180 
00181 
00189 inline static void opMOV(unsigned char X, unsigned char kk) {
00190     registers[X] = kk;
00191 }
00192 
00200 inline static void opMOV2(unsigned char X, unsigned char Y) {
00201     registers[X] = registers[Y];
00202 }
00203 
00210 inline static void opMOVI(unsigned short nnn) {
00211     I = nnn;
00212 }
00213 
00220 inline static void opMOVFD(unsigned short X) {
00221     V[X] = delay;
00222 }
00223 
00230 inline static void opMOVD(unsigned short X) {
00231     delay = V[X];
00232 }
00233 
00240 inline static void opMOVS(unsigned short X) {
00241     sound = V[X];
00242 }
00243 
00251 inline static void opADD(unsigned char X, unsigned char kk) {
00252     registers[X] += kk;
00253 }
00254 
00255 
00264 inline static void opADD2(unsigned char X, unsigned char Y) {
00265     registers[0xF] = ((int)registers[X] + (int)registers[Y] > 255) ? 1 : 0;
00266     registers[X] += registers[Y];
00267 }
00268 
00277 inline static void opSUB(unsigned char X, unsigned char Y) {
00278     registers[0xF] = (registers[X] > registers[Y]) ? 1 : 0;
00279     registers[X] -= registers[Y];
00280 }
00281 
00290 inline static void opSUBN(unsigned char X, unsigned char Y) {
00291     registers[0xF] = (registers[Y] > registers[X]) ? 1 : 0;
00292     registers[X] = registers[Y] - registers[X];
00293 }
00294 
00303 inline static void opSHR(unsigned char X) {
00304     registers[0xF] = (registers[X] % 2);
00305     registers[X] >> 1;
00306 }
00307 
00316 inline static void opSHL(unsigned char X) {
00317     registers[0xF] = (registers[X] >= 128) ? 1 : 0;
00318     registers[X] << 1;
00319 }
00320 
00328 inline static void opOR(unsigned char X, unsigned char Y) {
00329     registers[X] |= registers[Y];
00330 }
00331 
00332 
00340 inline static void opAND(unsigned char X, unsigned char Y) {
00341     registers[X] &= registers[Y];
00342 }
00343 
00351 inline static void opXOR(unsigned char X, unsigned char Y) {
00352     registers[X] ^= registers[Y];
00353 }
00354 
00362 inline static void opRND(unsigned char X, unsigned short kk) {
00363         registers[X] = (unsigned char)((rand() % 254) & kk);    
00364 }
00365 
00369 inline static void opDRW(unsigned char X, unsigned char Y, unsigned char n) {
00370         drawSprite(registers[x], registers[Y], memory + I, n);          
00371 }
00372 
00373 void tick() {
00374     // WHILE SMTH
00375     handleOpCode();
00376 }
00377 
00378 void handleOpCode() {
00379     unsigned short opCode;
00380     read(pc, 2, (char*)(&opCode));
00381     unsigned char byte1, byte2;
00382     byte1 = 0x01 & opCode;
00383     byte2 = 0x10 & opCode;
00384 
00385     if(opCode == 0x00E0) {
00386         opCLS();
00387     } else if(opCode == 0x00EE) {
00388         opRET();
00389     }
00390 
00391     else if(opCode & 0x1000 == 0x1000) {
00392         opJP(opCode & 0x0111);
00393     } else if(opCode & 0x1000 == 0x2000) {
00394         opCALL(opCode  & 0x0111);
00395     } else if(opCode & 0x1000 == 0x3000) {
00396         opSE(opCode & 0x0100, opCode & 0x0011);
00397     } else if(opCode & 0x1000 == 0x4000) {
00398         opSNE(opCode & 0x0100, opCode & 0x0011);
00399     } else if(opCode & 0x1001 == 0x5000) {
00400         opSE2(opCode & 0x0100, opCode & 0x0010);
00401     }
00402 
00403 
00404 }
